Description: Title: Technical Ticket Registration by User DESCRIPTION AS: User with a technical problem I WANT TO: Register a ticket describing my issue SO THAT: I can receive help from community experts
Main Flow: USE CASE (Main Flow) - GIVEN: The user is logged into the system AND is on the ticket creation page AND has a technical problem to report WHEN: The user fills out the form with the title, problem description, and category, and clicks “Submit Ticket” THEN: The system saves the ticket, displays a submission confirmation, and makes it visible to the area specialists
Alternative Flow: USE CASE – Alternative Flow: Ticket Registration with Incomplete Data GIVEN: the user is logged into the platform AND accessed the ticket section AND left one or more mandatory fields blank (such as title, description, or category) WHEN: the user clicks the “Submit Ticket” button THEN: the system prevents the ticket from being submitted AND displays error messages indicating which fields need to be filled

Description: Title: Notification Sent After User Request DESCRIPTION: The system will send notifications to experts for each request made by a user AS: Bernardo I WANT TO: Receive notifications FOR: Each request made by the user
Main Flow: USE CASES (Main Flow) - GIVEN: <The user opens the app to make a request about the problem> AND … AND … <The user is correctly registered, as is the specialist> WHEN: <The request is made> THEN: <The specialists will receive the notification that the user reported a problem in the system>
Alternative Flow: USE CASES (Alternative Flow) GIVEN: AND … AND … WHEN: THEN:

Description: Submit a Technical Problem on the Platform AS: User I WANT TO: Submit technical problems on the platform SO THAT: Other users can view them and submit their solutions
Main Flow: Main Use Case - GIVEN I registered my account on the platform AND I have already verified my email AND I filled in the details about the technical problem in a form WHEN I click the submit button THEN my problem will be saved in the platform database so that other users can view it
Alternative Flow: Alternative Use Case GIVEN: I entered the platform as an anonymous user AND I filled in the details about the technical problem in a form WHEN I click the submit button THEN my problem will be saved in the platform database so that other users can view it

Description: TEMPLATE: DESCRIPTION: AS: I WANT TO: SO THAT:
Main Flow: USE CASES (Main Flow) - GIVEN: <Having a technical problem> AND … AND … <I cannot solve it> WHEN: <Register the ticket> THEN: <I have a suggestion to solve it>
Alternative Flow: USE CASES (Alternative Flow) GIVEN: AND … AND … WHEN: THEN:

Description: Title: Technical Solutions Evaluation DESCRIPTION AS: User with technical problems I WANT TO: Vote on the best solutions proposed by experts SO THAT: I help other users quickly find the most efficient answers and contribute to recognizing the experts who help the most on the platform
Main Flow: Main Flow – Voting on Useful Solution - GIVEN: I am logged into the platform AND I viewed a ticket with multiple responses AND I found a solution that solved my problem WHEN: I click the "Vote as Useful" button next to the answer THEN: The specialist's score is updated
Alternative Flow: Alternative Flow – Vote Withdrawn GIVEN: I voted on an answer previously AND realized that the answer did not completely solve the problem WHEN: I click the “Vote as Useful” button again to undo the vote THEN: the specialist’s score is reduced AND the position of the answer in the ticket ranking is re-evaluated

Description: Title: Report Technical Problem on the Platform DESCRIPTION AS: User with a technical problem I WANT TO: Report a problem on the platform SO THAT: I can receive help from community experts
Main Flow: USE CASE – Main Flow - GIVEN: the user is logged into the platform AND: accesses the ticket area AND: correctly fills out the form with details of the problem WHEN: he submits the ticket THEN: the ticket is published, notifying specialists and remaining visible for voting and solution suggestions
Alternative Flow: USE CASE – Alternative Flow GIVEN: the user is logged into the platform AND: accesses the ticket area AND: tries to fill out the form with incomplete or invalid information WHEN: they click the “Submit Ticket” button THEN: the system displays error messages indicating the mandatory fields not filled and prevents submission until the form is correctly completed

Description: Ticket Registration by User with Technical Problem
Main Flow: Main Flow – Ticket Registration and Specialist Response - GIVEN the user is logged into the platform AND has a specific technical problem AND accesses the “Report Ticket” area WHEN the user fills out the form with the title, problem description, and category THEN the ticket is published on the platform AND the specialists receive a notification about the new ticket AND can respond with solution suggestions AND the user can mark the best answer, assigning points to the specialist
Alternative Flow: GIVEN: the user is logged into the platform AND is browsing tickets similar to theirs WHEN they find a useful solution in another ticket THEN they can upvote the specialist's answer AND the specialist receives additional points in the ranking AND the system automatically recommends this solution for similar tickets

Description: TechFix – Collaborative Technical Support Platform: DESCRIPTION AS: Regular TechFix platform user I WANT TO: Report a detailed technical problem SO THAT: I can receive help from community experts and resolve my problem quickly
Main Flow: USE CASES - Main Flow – Ticket Registration - GIVEN: I am logged into the platform AND I access the "Report Problem" section AND I fill in the required fields with title, description, and category of the problem WHEN: I click the "Submit Ticket" button THEN: the ticket is registered in the system AND it is visible in the public list for specialists to view AND I receive a notification confirming the registration of the ticket
Alternative Flow: Alternative Flow – Ticket Registration with Incomplete Data GIVEN: I am logged into the platform AND I access the "Report Problem" section AND I fill in only the problem title, leaving other fields blank WHEN: I click the "Submit Ticket" button THEN: the system displays an error message indicating the mandatory fields AND prevents submission until all required fields are filled

Description: Title: Best Answers DESCRIPTION AS: TechFix platform user I WANT TO: Vote on the answers I consider best SO THAT: I can select the best solutions and help other users
Main Flow: USE CASE – Main Flow: - GIVEN: I log into the platform AND: I accessed a ticket with more than one answer WHEN: I click to positively vote on an answer that helped me THEN: the system counts my vote AND: the score of the answer of who responded is updated
Alternative Flow: USE CASE – Simple Alternative Flow: GIVEN: I am logged into the platform AND: I try to vote on an answer I wrote myself WHEN: I click to vote on my own answer THEN: the system blocks the action AND: displays a message stating that voting on your own answer is not allowed

Description: User Story: AS: User I WANT TO: Report technical problems SO THAT: I receive solutions to my problem provided by experts
Main Flow: Main Use Case: - GIVEN: The user is logged into the system AND: The user is on the form screen AND: The user filled out the form field with the desired message WHEN: The user clicks the form's "submit" button THEN: The system will store the user's message AND: The system will display the user's message on the problem display screen so that the logged-in specialists see it AND: The system will notify the specialists that there is a new problem
Alternative Flow: Alternative Use Case: GIVEN: the user is logged into the system AND: the user is on the form screen AND: the user filled in the form field with the desired message WHEN: the user clicks the "cancel" button on the form THEN: the system returns to the home screen

Description: User Story Title: Voting on Useful Answers DESCRIPTION AS: Platform user I WANT TO: Vote on useful answers SO THAT: I can help other users
Alternative Flow: GIVEN: I am browsing without login WHEN: I try to vote as useful THEN: I am redirected to login AND: after login, I return to the answer and can vote

Description: Title: Technical Ticket Registration by User DESCRIPTION AS: TechFix platform user I WANT TO: Register a technical ticket detailing my problem SO THAT: I receive solution suggestions from community experts
Main Flow: USE CASE (Main Flow) GIVEN: the user is logged into the platform AND: accesses the “Open Ticket” section AND: fills in the required information such as title, problem description, and category WHEN: clicks the “Submit Ticket” button THEN: the ticket is registered in the system AND: it is available for specialists to view AND: the user receives a notification confirming ticket registration
Alternative Flow: USE CASE (Alternative Flow) GIVEN: the user is logged into the platform AND: accesses the "Open Ticket" section AND: leaves one or more mandatory fields blank (such as title or description) WHEN: they try to click the “Submit Ticket” button THEN: the system displays an error message indicating the missing mandatory fields AND: prevents submission until all necessary information is completed

Description: DESCRIPTION AS: Regular user with technical difficulties I WANT TO: Report a technical problem on the platform SO THAT: I can receive expert help and find a solution quickly
Main Flow: USE CASES Main Flow – Ticket Registration GIVEN: I am logged into the platform AND I am facing a technical problem AND I have access to the new ticket form WHEN: I fill in the form with the title, description, and category of the problem and click "Submit" THEN: A new ticket is registered in the system AND specialists are notified based on the chosen category AND the ticket becomes visible on the main page so specialists can respond
Alternative Flow: Alternative Flow – Voting on Answer GIVEN: I already have a ticket with specialist responses AND I am logged into the platform WHEN: I read a useful answer and click the “Vote as Useful” button THEN: the answer receives an upvote AND the responsible specialist earns points in the scoring system AND the answer is visually prioritized among the others

Description: Technical Problem Registration AS: System user I WANT TO: Report a technical problem SO THAT: Technicians and experts can suggest solutions
Main Flow: USE CASES (Ticket Registration) GIVEN: I am inside the system AND I have technical problems WHEN: I enter the system and try to fill in the description field THEN: I cannot register a problem
Alternative Flow: USE CASES (Notifications) GIVEN: I am inside the system AND I have technical problems WHEN: I register the technical problem and do not receive response notifications THEN: I cannot know if someone answered my question

Description: AS: TechFix platform user I WANT TO: Report a detailed technical problem SO THAT: I can receive solution suggestions from experts and resolve the problem quickly
Main Flow: Main Flow – Technical Ticket Registration GIVEN: I am logged into the platform AND: I am on the ticket creation page AND: I fill in the form with title, description, and problem category WHEN: I click the "Submit Ticket" button THEN: the system registers the ticket and makes it available for specialists to view AND: I receive a notification confirming ticket registration
Alternative Flow: Alternative Flow – Attempt to Register with Incomplete Form GIVEN: I am logged into the platform AND: I am on the ticket creation page AND: I fill in only the title, leaving the description blank WHEN: I click the “Submit Ticket” button THEN: the system displays an error message indicating that all mandatory fields must be filled AND: the ticket is not registered until all information is completed

Description: Title: Technical Ticket Registration by User DESCRIPTION AS: TechFix platform user I WANT TO: Register a technical ticket reporting my problem SO THAT: I can receive expert help more quickly and in an organized way
Main Flow: USE CASE (Main Flow) GIVEN: the user is logged into the TechFix platform AND: accesses the ticket section AND: has a technical problem to report WHEN: fills in the ticket registration form with problem description, category, and urgency level THEN: the ticket is successfully registered and is available for specialists to view
Alternative Flow: USE CASE (Alternative Flow) GIVEN: the user is logged into the TechFix platform AND: accesses the ticket section AND: tries to fill out the ticket registration form WHEN: they leave mandatory fields blank or enter invalid information THEN: the system displays error messages and prevents submission until the form is correctly completed

Description: USER STORY Ticket Registration AS: User I WANT TO: Register my tickets SO THAT: My technical problems can be resolved
Main Flow: USE CASE (Main Flow) – Register a Technical Problem GIVEN: I have valid credentials AND I have entered them correctly WHEN: I insert my technical problem into the ticket THEN: it will be registered and a specialist can suggest a solution
Alternative Flow: USE CASE (Alternative Flow) – Invalid Credentials GIVEN: I do not have valid credentials AND I enter them into the system WHEN: I press the login button THEN: an error occurs and I cannot access the system

Description: Technical Ticket Registration by User AS: User I WANT TO: Register a ticket describing the problem I am facing SO THAT: I can receive solution suggestions from TechFix community experts
Main Flow: Main Flow: Technical Ticket Registration GIVEN: the user is authenticated on the platform AND is on the ticket creation page AND has all the information about the problem WHEN: they fill in the form with the problem description and click “Register Ticket” THEN: the ticket is created in the system AND specialists receive a notification about the new ticket AND the ticket is visible in the public feed of the platform
Alternative Flow: Alternative Flow: Attempt to register a ticket without being authenticated GIVEN: the user accesses the platform without being logged in AND tries to access the ticket creation feature WHEN: they click “Register Ticket” THEN: the system redirects the user to the login page AND displays a message stating that login is required to register tickets

Description: SYSTEM ACCESS AS: I WANT TO: SO THAT:
Main Flow: USE CASES (Main Flow) GIVEN: <student is already registered in the system> AND <login was accepted> WHEN: <student is on the user profile page> THEN: <list the student's personal data>
Alternative Flow: USE CASE (Alternative Flow) GIVEN: <student on the user profile page> AND <identified an old email> WHEN: <student selects the "edit" button> THEN: <opens the data for the student to make changes>

Description: Title: Subscribe to Weekly Organic Product Deliveries DESCRIPTION AS: Regular GreenMarket consumer I WANT TO: Subscribe to a weekly organic product delivery plan SO THAT: I receive fresh, quality food at home without having to place manual orders every week
Main Flow: USE CASE – Main Flow: Subscribe to Weekly Deliveries GIVEN the user is logged into the app AND has already selected their delivery address AND navigated to the "Subscription Plans" section WHEN they select a weekly plan and confirm payment THEN the subscription is successfully activated AND the user receives confirmation by email AND the upcoming deliveries are automatically scheduled according to the chosen plan
Alternative Flow: USE CASE – Alternative Flow: Pause Subscription Deliveries GIVEN: the user has an active subscription AND wants to pause deliveries for a period WHEN: they access the "My Subscriptions" area and choose the "Pause Deliveries" option THEN: the subscription is temporarily suspended AND the user can set the automatic reactivation date or choose to reactivate manually later AND no deliveries are charged during the paused period

Description: Title: Weekly Organic Product Subscription DESCRIPTION: Weekly subscription system for delivering organic products to consumers AS: Conscious consumer who values healthy and sustainable products I WANT TO: Subscribe to recurring deliveries of organic fruits and vegetables SO THAT: I receive fresh products weekly without placing new orders each time
Main Flow: Main Flow GIVEN: the consumer is logged into the app AND has a registered address and payment method AND subscription plans are available for their region WHEN: they select a subscription plan and confirm the purchase THEN: the system activates the subscription, schedules weekly deliveries, and sends a confirmation by email
Alternative Flow: Alternative Flow (Region without coverage) GIVEN: the consumer is logged into the app AND has a registered address and payment method AND there are no subscription plans available for their region WHEN: they try to select a subscription plan THEN: the system displays the message “We do not deliver in your region yet” and offers the option to receive a future email notification

Description: Title: Weekly Organic Product Subscription DESCRIPTION AS: GreenMarket app consumer I WANT TO: Subscribe to a weekly delivery of organic products SO THAT: I automatically receive a selection of fresh, certified products at home without reordering weekly
Main Flow: Main Flow – Weekly Delivery Subscription GIVEN: I am logged into the app AND: I have a registered delivery address AND: My payment method is active and valid WHEN: I select the “Weekly Subscription” option and choose the products or basket type I want to receive THEN: the system confirms the subscription AND: Shows the date of the next delivery AND: Starts scheduling automatic weekly deliveries with recurring billing
Alternative Flow: Alternative Flow – Subscription Failure due to Invalid Card GIVEN: I am logged into the app AND: I have a registered delivery address AND: my payment method is expired or invalid WHEN: I try to finalize the weekly subscription THEN: the system displays an error message indicating a payment problem AND: requests that I update my payment information to complete the subscription

Description: TEMPLATE – ORDER HISTORY DESCRIPTION Allow the consumer to view previous orders made in the app, including purchase date, items, total amount, and delivery status AS: GreenMarket consumer I WANT TO: Access my order history SO THAT: I can track past purchases, check values, and easily repeat orders
Main Flow: USE CASE – Main Flow: View Order History GIVEN: the user is logged into the app AND: has made at least one previous order WHEN: they access the "Order History" section in the main menu THEN: the system should display a list of previous orders with date, amount, and delivery status
Alternative Flow: USE CASE – Alternative Flow: No Previous Orders GIVEN: the user is logged into the app AND: has never placed an order WHEN: they access the "Order History" section THEN: the system should display a friendly message like “You haven’t made any orders yet. Explore our products and make your first purchase!”

Description: DESCRIPTION AS: Consumer interested in organic products I WANT TO: Subscribe to a weekly delivery plan for fruits and vegetables SO THAT: I receive fresh products at home regularly and support local small producers
Main Flow: GIVEN: the user is logged into the app AND has a registered address AND subscription plans are available for their region WHEN: the user accesses the "Weekly Subscriptions" tab and selects a plan THEN: the plan is activated with payment confirmation AND the user starts receiving the products weekly at the chosen address
Alternative Flow: GIVEN: the user is logged into the app AND has a registered address AND there are no subscription plans available for their region WHEN: the user tries to subscribe to a weekly plan THEN: the system displays a message informing that no deliveries are available in the region AND offers the option to be notified when availability occurs

Description: Title: Product Purchase DESCRIPTION AS: Buyer I WANT TO: Purchase products in the system SO THAT: I can acquire new products
Main Flow: USE CASES (Main Flow) GIVEN: I made a purchase AND … AND … I am logged in, WHEN: I click the confirm purchase button THEN: I want to be able to track the delivery of the product
Alternative Flow: USE CASES (Alternative Flow) GIVEN: I made a purchase AND … AND … I am not logged in WHEN: I click the confirm purchase button THEN: I want to be able to authenticate in the system and track the product delivery

Description: Consumer user analyzes their order history
Main Flow: DESCRIPTION GIVEN: Consumer user WANTS TO: Analyze my order history SO THAT: I can have control over my expenses
Alternative Flow: GIVEN: the consumer user is logged in AND: has previously made a purchase WHEN: they access the order history tab AND: define a time period THEN: they will have access to the full history based on the selected period

Description: Agro Product Purchase App DESCRIPTION: An app made for users to track the origin of products and offers a subscription system for weekly deliveries AS: Consumer I WANT TO: Check which vegetables are at the best price SO THAT: I can save money
Main Flow: USE CASE: Check product prices GIVEN: The user has an account AND is logged in WHEN: clicks on the prices tab on the screen THEN: they will see a detailed list of the products and their prices
Alternative Flow: USE CASE: Attempts to place an order without specifying products GIVEN: the user is logged into the platform AND tried to make an order WHEN: they click the purchase button THEN: the option will be considered invalid and the system will return to the menu

Description: Activation of Weekly Organic Product Subscription AS: Consumer interested in organic products I WANT TO: Activate a weekly product delivery subscription SO THAT: I ensure convenience, regular deliveries, and maintain a healthy diet without placing manual orders every week
Main Flow: GIVEN: the user is logged into the app AND has already added a set of organic products to the cart AND has a registered delivery address WHEN: they select the “Activate Weekly Delivery” option at checkout THEN: the system creates a recurring subscription with weekly delivery, confirms the first delivery, and sends a confirmation notification to the user
Alternative Flow: GIVEN: the user is logged into the app AND tries to activate the weekly subscription during checkout WHEN: the system detects that there is no registered delivery address THEN: the system displays a message requesting a valid address to proceed with the subscription

Description: User Story Title: Subscribe to Weekly Organic Product Delivery DESCRIPTION AS: Consumer interested in organic products I WANT TO: Subscribe to an automatic weekly delivery of fruits and vegetables SO THAT: I receive fresh products regularly without placing manual orders every week
Main Flow: USE CASE (Main Flow) GIVEN: I am logged into the app AND: I have already registered a delivery address AND: I have chosen my favorite organic products WHEN: I confirm the weekly subscription option on the payment screen THEN: the system automatically schedules the weekly delivery AND: Displays a summary of the subscription in the “My Subscriptions” area AND: Sends a notification by email and in the app with the details of the next delivery
Alternative Flow: USE CASE (Alternative Flow) GIVEN: I am logged into the app AND: have not registered a delivery address WHEN: I try to confirm the weekly subscription on the payment screen THEN: the system displays an alert requesting address registration AND: redirects to the address registration screen before finalizing the subscription

Description: Title: Weekly Organic Product Subscription DESCRIPTION AS: GreenMarket app consumer I WANT TO: Subscribe to a weekly delivery plan of organic products SO THAT: I receive fresh food at home conveniently and regularly
Main Flow: GIVEN: I am logged into the app AND: I have access to the catalog of products and available plans AND: I have chosen a weekly subscription plan WHEN: I confirm the subscription and the delivery address THEN: the subscription is activated AND: I receive weekly notifications about the delivery AND: The products are delivered to the registered address automatically
Alternative Flow: GIVEN: I am logged into the app AND: try to subscribe to a weekly plan AND: have not registered a delivery address WHEN: I click "Confirm Subscription" THEN: the system displays an alert requesting address registration AND: I am redirected to fill in the address AND: after saving, I can complete the subscription normally

Description: AS: Consumer I WANT TO: Subscribe to organic products SO THAT: I receive quality products at home in a simplified way
Main Flow: GIVEN: The consumer enters their credentials and logs into the app AND: accesses the subscription tab AND: chooses the desired products WHEN: they confirm the subscription THEN: this subscription is registered in the system
Alternative Flow: GIVEN: the consumer enters credentials and logs into the app AND: accesses the subscription tab AND: does not fill in all required information for the purchase WHEN: they try to confirm the subscription THEN: an error message is displayed in the system

Description: DESCRIPTION AS: User I WANT TO: View my order history SO THAT: I can see information about what was purchased, how much was spent, from whom it was purchased, etc.
Main Flow: USE CASE GIVEN: I am logged into the app WHEN: I click the history button THEN: the system will show me a table with all recent purchases I have made through the app
Alternative Flow: ALTERNATIVE FLOW GIVEN: I am logged into the app AND: on the app history screen WHEN: I click the date button AND: set a time range in the calendar THEN: the system will filter the content shown in the table

Description: Title: Geolocation and Interaction with Organic Producers DESCRIPTION AS: Conscious and engaged consumer in healthy eating I WANT TO: Locate nearby organic producers and interact with them via the app SO THAT: I ensure the origin of the food, clarify cultivation doubts, and make more informed choices
Main Flow: USE CASE (Main Flow): GIVEN: The user is logged into the app and allowed access to their location AND: there are producers registered near the user's location WHEN: the user accesses the app's interactive map THEN: the system displays the nearest organic producers, with details about their products, ratings, and a chat button for direct contact
Alternative Flow: USE CASE (Alternative Flow): GIVEN: the user is logged into the app AND no producers are registered near the specified location WHEN: the user tries to access the producer map THEN: the system displays a message stating no producers are available in the region, offers the option to expand the search radius, and suggests the user activate notifications to be informed when new producers are registered in the area

Description: AS: Consumer of organic products I WANT TO: Buy a subscription for weekly delivery SO THAT: I receive quality products every week
Main Flow: Subscription activation for a user without an active subscription GIVEN: I am logged into the app AND: click to subscribe WHEN: I enter my data THEN: my subscription will become active
Alternative Flow: Subscription registration for a user with an already active subscription GIVEN: I am logged into the app AND click to subscribe WHEN: I am directed to the data entry page THEN: I am informed that I already have an active subscription AND the system will not register a new subscription

Description: DESCRIPTION Create a new subscription for weekly deliveries AS: Consumer I WANT TO: Make a weekly delivery subscription SO THAT: I can facilitate the routine purchase of fruits and vegetables
Main Flow: USE CASE Main Flow GIVEN: The user is logged in AND … AND … accesses the subscriptions tab WHEN: presses the new subscription button and there are available delivery personnel for the address THEN: a new subscription is registered for the consumer
Alternative Flow: USE CASE Alternative GIVEN: the user is logged in AND … AND … accesses the new subscription tab WHEN: they press yes for a new subscription, and no delivery personnel are available for the location THEN: the system informs that there are currently no delivery personnel available for the selected location and asks if they wish to change the location

Description: Title: Subscribe to Weekly Organic Product Delivery DESCRIPTION AS: Conscious consumer seeking healthy and sustainable food I WANT TO: Subscribe to a weekly delivery of organic products from local producers SO THAT: I receive fresh food at home conveniently and regularly, supporting local agriculture
Main Flow: USE CASE – Main Flow: Successful weekly subscription GIVEN: I am logged into the app AND: I have a registered delivery address AND: I have a valid payment method WHEN: I access the subscription option in the main menu and choose the weekly delivery plan with the desired products THEN: The system confirms the subscription, schedules the upcoming deliveries, and sends a confirmation notification to the user
Alternative Flow: USE CASE – Alternative Flow: Subscription failure due to missing payment method GIVEN: I am logged into the app AND: I have a registered delivery address AND: I do not have a valid payment method registered WHEN: I try to confirm the weekly product subscription THEN: the system displays an error message requesting registration of a valid payment method and prevents finalizing the subscription until the requirement is met

Description: Title: Product Evaluation DESCRIPTION AS: Customer I WANT TO: Review a purchased product SO THAT: It helps other users with their purchases
Main Flow: USE CASE Main Flow GIVEN: The client bought a product AND received the product WHEN: They rate a product THEN: the review becomes available on the platform for other users
Alternative Flow: USE CASE Alternative Flow GIVEN: The customer has not purchased a product AND tries to rate the product WHEN: the review is submitted THEN: an error message appears indicating that they did not purchase the product and cannot evaluate it

Description: Title: Weekly Organic Product Subscription DESCRIPTION AS: Consumer interested in healthy eating I WANT TO: Subscribe to a weekly delivery of organic products SO THAT: I receive fresh and reliably sourced food at home without placing manual orders weekly
Main Flow: Main Flow – Subscribe to weekly product delivery GIVEN: I am logged into the app AND: have already added products to my cart AND: I am on the checkout screen WHEN: I select the “Activate weekly subscription” option and confirm payment THEN: the system automatically schedules delivery of the same products for the upcoming weeks AND sends a notification before each new charge
Alternative Flow: Alternative Flow – Modify subscription products before the next delivery GIVEN: I have an active weekly subscription AND received a notification about the next delivery WHEN: I access the subscription and modify the items before the deadline THEN: the system updates the products that will be sent that week AND confirms the change via email and in-app notification

Description: Title: User with Technical Problems to be Registered in a Ticket DESCRIPTION AS: User with a technical problem I WANT TO: Create a ticket describing my problem SO THAT: I receive solution suggestions from platform experts
Main Flow: GIVEN: I am logged into the platform AND: I access the ticket creation page AND: correctly fill in the required fields (title, description, category) WHEN: I click “Submit Ticket” THEN: the ticket is registered in the system AND: I am available to receive notifications when specialists respond AND: the ticket appears in the public list for specialists to view
Alternative Flow: GIVEN: I am logged into the platform AND: access the ticket creation page AND: leave any mandatory field empty WHEN: I click "Submit Ticket" THEN: the system displays an error message indicating which fields need to be completed AND: the ticket is not submitted until all required information is completed

Description: DESCRIPTION AS: User I WANT TO: Evaluate answers SO THAT: I can classify that answer as the best
Main Flow: USE CASE (Main Flow) GIVEN: I am a user AND I want to rate a response WHEN: I click 'like' THEN: the response will receive my positive rating
Alternative Flow: USE CASE (Alternative Flow) GIVEN: I am an unauthenticated user AND I want to rate an answer WHEN: I click 'like' THEN: the system displays the message 'please log in to submit your review'

Description: TechFix – Collaborative Technical Support Platform: A startup launches a system where users can report technical problems, and experts can suggest solutions. The system allows users to vote on the best answers, and experts earn points according to how well their solutions are rated.
Main Flow: AS: A registered specialist on the platform I WANT TO: Suggest solutions for problems reported by users SO THAT: I can share technical knowledge and help resolve tickets
Alternative Flow: MAIN FLOW GIVEN: I am registered as a specialist on the platform AND: a user opened a ticket describing a technical problem AND: I suggested a solution to the problem WHEN: my answer is well rated by other users THEN: I receive points in the scoring system AND: my position in the specialist ranking is automatically updated AND: I am notified about the positive feedback ALTERNATIVE FLOW GIVEN: I am registered as a specialist on the platform AND: a user opened a ticket describing a technical problem AND: I suggested a solution WHEN: my answer receives negative ratings from users THEN: I do not receive points in the scoring system AND: I am notified with feedback indicating that my answer was poorly rated

Description: TITLE: Scoring System DESCRIPTION: The user scores answers provided by experts AS: Authenticated system user I WANT TO: See solutions provided by experts SO THAT: I can score the best solution
Main Flow: GIVEN: I am authenticated in the system AND: I have an active account WHEN: I try to view the solutions provided by specialists THEN: the system allows it AND I can rate the specialists’ solutions
Alternative Flow: GIVEN: I am not authenticated in the system AND do not have a login WHEN: I try to view solutions provided by specialists THEN: the system does not allow it AND redirects me to the registration screen

Description: TITLE: Ticket Registration DESCRIPTION AS: System user I WANT TO: Report a technical problem SO THAT: It is answered by experts with solutions
Main Flow: USE CASE: Authenticated user submitting a ticket. GIVEN: I am logged into the system as a user AND: I have already described my technical problem WHEN: I submit the report THEN: I receive a confirmation message
Alternative Flow: USE CASE: Unauthenticated user submitting a ticket GIVEN: I am not logged into the system as a user AND described my technical problem WHEN: I submit the report THEN: I receive a message to create an account

Description: Title: Opening Technical Ticket by Regular User DESCRIPTION AS: User with technical difficulty on the computer I WANT TO: Register a ticket with details of my problem SO THAT: I receive fast and appropriate help from platform experts
Main Flow: GIVEN: I am logged into the TechFix platform AND: I filled out the required fields in the ticket form AND: I selected the appropriate problem category WHEN: I click the “Submit Ticket” button THEN: the ticket is published on the platform AND specialists are notified about the new request AND the ticket is visible in my account for tracking
Alternative Flow: GIVEN: I am logged into the TechFix platform AND tried to submit a ticket without filling in all mandatory fields WHEN: I click the "Submit Ticket" button THEN: the system displays an error message AND highlights the fields that need to be corrected before allowing submission

Description: DESCRIPTION: Ticket registration for expert analysis, made by system users AS: System user I WANT TO: Check if my problem has already been reported and answered, and if not, register a ticket to inform about a technical problem I have SO THAT: An expert can analyze the problem and provide a possible solution
Main Flow: USE CASE (Main Flow – Previously Reported Problem) GIVEN: I am a user of the system AND: I have a technical problem WHEN: I check in the system for a similar previously registered report AND: I find a similar one AND: its response was well-rated THEN: I apply the provided solution AND: I later evaluate the response according to the result
Alternative Flow: USE CASE (Alternative Flow – Problem not previously reported) GIVEN: I am a user of the system AND have a technical problem WHEN: I check the system for an existing similar report AND do not find any THEN: I register a ticket specifying the problem AND the system should make this ticket available for specialists to analyze and respond

Description: DESCRIPTION AS: <Specialis> I WANT TO: <Suggest a solution for a user’s problem> SO THAT: <gain points>
Main Flow: USE CASE (Main Flow) GIVEN: I am a specialist AND: I want to solve a user’s problem WHEN: I enter the system and see a question or problem AND: I select the problem I know how to solve THEN: I solve the problem for the user and receive my points
Alternative Flow: USE CASE (Alternative Flow) GIVEN: I am a user AND: want to report a technical problem WHEN: I enter the system AND: realize I am not registered THEN: I register my account to report my problem

Description: Technical Problem Reporting and Collaborative Resolution DESCRIPTION AS: TechFix platform user I WANT TO: Report a technical problem and obtain a fast and effective solution SO THAT: I minimize the problem’s impact on my work and learn from the solution provided
Main Flow: USE CASE – Main Flow GIVEN: The user identifies a technical problem on their device AND: They access the TechFix platform and select the “Report Problem” option AND: They fill in the problem details, including category, description, and evidence (images or logs) WHEN: The user submits the report THEN: The ticket is registered, specialists are notified, and the user can track interactions toward the solution
Alternative Flow: USE CASE – Alternative Flow GIVEN: The user reports a technical problem but forgets to include essential information for diagnosis AND … The system detects the missing information and requests additional details from the user WHEN: the user adds the missing details THEN: the ticket is re-evaluated, properly registered, and specialists are notified to begin analysis

Description: Title: Purchase Organic Products DESCRIPTION AS: GreenMarket consumer I WANT TO: Buy organic products directly from small producers SO THAT: I have access to fresh, quality food with guaranteed origin
Main Flow: USE CASE (Main Flow) GIVEN: The consumer is logged into the app AND: There are organic products registered on the platform AND: The consumer has selected the desired products for purchase WHEN: The consumer confirms the purchase and chooses the payment method THEN: The order is registered in the system AND: The consumer receives the purchase confirmation and estimated delivery
Alternative Flow: USE CASE (Alternative Flow) GIVEN: The consumer is logged into the app AND: there are organic products registered on the platform AND: the consumer selected the desired products for purchase WHEN: the consumer chooses the subscription system for weekly deliveries THEN: the order is registered in the system as recurring AND: the consumer receives confirmation of the subscription and the date of the first delivery

Description: DESCRIPTION AS: Conscious consumer who values organic and traceable food I WANT TO: Subscribe to a weekly delivery of organic products from local producers SO THAT: I ensure fresh, healthy food and support small farmers in my region
Main Flow: USE CASE (Main Flow) GIVEN: I am logged into the app AND: I have my address registered AND: I have a valid payment method linked to my account WHEN: I select an available organic basket and click “Subscribe to Weekly Delivery” THEN: The system confirms the subscription AND: Schedules weekly delivery to my registered address AND: Displays a subscription summary in the “My Subscriptions” area
Alternative Flow: USE CASE (Alternative Flow) GIVEN: I am logged into the app AND: I have my address registered AND: I do not have a registered payment method WHEN: I select an organic basket and click “Subscribe to weekly delivery” THEN: the system displays a message requesting registration of a payment method AND redirects to the "Payment Methods" screen

Description: DESCRIPTION: Product Evaluation by Consumers After Delivery AS: GreenMarket consumer I WANT TO: Review the products I receive after each delivery SO THAT: I help other consumers with my opinions and contribute to the reputation of producers
Main Flow: USE CASE (Main Flow) GIVEN: The consumer has already received their delivery AND: Is logged into the app AND: The delivery is marked as completed in the order history WHEN: The consumer accesses the order history and selects the option to review the received products THEN: The system allows them to assign a rating and write a comment for each item AND: The review is recorded and displayed on the product and producer pages
Alternative Flow: USE CASE (Alternative Flow) GIVEN: The consumer received the delivery AND: is logged into the app AND: the delivery is marked as completed in the order history WHEN: the consumer tries to rate a product but 24 hours have not yet passed since delivery THEN: the system displays a message informing that the review will be available after this period AND: the review option remains disabled until the minimum time is met

Description: Subscribe to Weekly Organic Product Deliveries AS: Health-conscious consumer I WANT TO: Subscribe to a weekly organic product delivery plan SO THAT: I receive fresh food at home directly from trusted producers without placing manual orders weekly
Main Flow: GIVEN: The user is authenticated in the app AND: has an account with a registered delivery address AND: there are producers available with deliveries in their region WHEN: the user accesses the “Subscriptions” area and selects a weekly delivery plan THEN: the system activates the subscription, schedules the first delivery, and displays the confirmation to the user
Alternative Flow: GIVEN: the user is authenticated in the app AND: accesses the "Subscriptions" area AND: tries to select a plan WHEN: the system checks that there are no producers with delivery available in their region THEN: the system displays a message informing the unavailability of delivery and suggests the user activate a notification to be informed when availability occurs

Description: TITLE: View the Origin and Details of Organic Products DESCRIPTION AS: Consumer concerned about food origin I WANT TO: View the origin and detailed information about the organic products I buy SO THAT: I ensure I am purchasing quality products with organic cultivation certification
Main Flow: Main Flow – View Product Origin and Information GIVEN: I am logged into the app AND: I accessed the list of available products for purchase AND: I selected an item from the list (e.g., organic apple) WHEN: I click on the “View Origin and Details” option of the product THEN: the app displays the producer’s information, property location, cultivation type, certifications, and harvest date
Alternative Flow: Alternative Flow – Product without complete information GIVEN: I am logged into the app AND: accessed the list of available products AND: selected an item from the list WHEN: I click the "View origin and details" option of the product THEN: the app displays a message informing that detailed information has not yet been provided by the producer AND offers the option to send a message to the producer via integrated chat to request the information

Description: DESCRIPTION AS: User I WANT TO: Track product origin and access a subscription system SO THAT: I can receive organic products weekly
Main Flow: USE CASE (Producer Geolocation) GIVEN: I want to see the producers in my region AND … AND … I type the desired location/address WHEN: I click on the search option THEN: the system shows me the producers present in my region
Alternative Flow: USE CASE (Producer Geolocation) GIVEN: I want to see producers in my region AND … AND … I type the desired location/address WHEN: I click the search option THEN: the system shows producers from a different locality than the one provided

Description: Title: DESCRIPTION AS: Regular GreenMarket consumer I WANT TO: Check my order history SO THAT: I can search for a product I recently purchased using a search feature
Main Flow: USE CASE (Product from History Found) GIVEN: I am on the app’s main screen, logged in AND: the option to view my order history appears on the screen AND: I click on the mentioned option WHEN: a list appears containing all products, and at the top of this list, there is a search bar THEN: I click on the bar and type the product AND: it appears, containing information about the last time it was purchased, with the option for me to view the product
Alternative Flow: Use Case (Product from history not found) GIVEN: I am on the main app screen, logged in AND the option to view my order history appears AND I click the mentioned option WHEN: a list appears containing all products, and at the top of the list there is a search bar THEN: I click on the bar, type the product, AND a "product not found" message appears, with a note suggesting to search for the product without using the history

Description: USER STORY: Review of Purchased Products AS: Person concerned with consuming organic and certified products I WANT TO: Review the products I acquired on the platform SO THAT: Producer services are improved
Main Flow: MAIN USE CASE: Purchased Product Review GIVEN: The user has a registered profile in the system AND: the user has already purchased a specific food product from a producer AND: the user is logged into the system WHEN: the user accesses the product page; or WHEN: the user accesses the purchase history page of a specific purchased product THEN: the system displays a review box AND: the system presents possible ratings from 1 star to 5 stars AND: the system presents a text field for detailed review writing
Alternative Flow: USE CASE ALTERNATIVE: User without purchase history of the product GIVEN: the user has a registered profile in the system AND the user has not acquired a specific food from the producer AND the user is logged into the system WHEN: the user accesses the product page THEN: the system does not display the product review box

Description: Title: Consumption of Organic Products Directly from Small Producers DESCRIPTION AS: A consumer of vegetables, legumes, and other organic products I WANT TO: Know the origin of the products I consume, receive my favorite products conveniently at home, and ask producers questions if desired SO THAT: I can consume quality products that meet the standards I consider important regarding the food I buy
Main Flow: USE CASE – MAIN FLOW GIVEN: I open the app AND: I am interested in placing an order WHEN: I navigate through the home page, the most relevant, highly-rated, and closest producers to my geolocation are recommended THEN: I place my order and the products I selected arrive at the comfort of my home AND: with the quality ensured by the suppliers found in the app
Alternative Flow:
USE CASE – ALTERNATIVE FLOW

GIVEN: I selected a highly rated product AND this product was delivered to my home AND the product does not match the quality assured and promised by the app.
WHEN: I receive this product from the delivery person along with a confirmation code AND I do not want the product, I can access the order history.
THEN: I either submit a review once the order is delivered OR request the product return and refund. Confirming a negative experience and evaluating the producer.
